title: Guns N' Roses - Discography
description:
Hi, today I'm uploading Guns N' Roses's discography, including the latest album, Chinese democracy.

Guns N' Roses are an American hard rock band who formed in Los Angeles, California, in 1985. The classic lineup as signed to Geffen Records in 1986, consisted of vocalist Axl Rose, lead guitarist Slash, rhythm guitarist Izzy Stradlin, bassist Duff McKagan, and drummer Steven Adler. Today, Axl Rose is the only remaining original member, in a lineup that comprises Use Your IllusionGÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ´era keyboardist Dizzy Reed, lead guitarists DJ Ashba and Ron "Bumblefoot" Thal, lead and rhythm guitarist Richard Fortus, bassist Tommy Stinson, drummer Frank Ferrer and keyboardist Chris Pitman. The band released six studio albums, accumulating sales of more than 150 million records worldwide,[9] including shipments of 45 million in the United States,[10] making them one of the worldGÃƒâ€¡Ãƒâ€“s best-selling bands of all time.

Includes: 
-1987 - Guns N Roses - Appetite For Destruction
-1989 - Guns N Roses - Lies
-1991 - Guns N Roses - Use Your Illusion I
-1991 - Guns N Roses - Use Your Illusion II
-1993 - Guns N Roses - The Spaghetti Incident
-2008 - Guns N Roses Chinese Democracy

All the albums haver their respectiv cover, the audio is in mpp3 format at 320kbps.
